title: Minecraft客户端崩溃
author: 星际归来
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-7-3 18:08 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.6.3-anarchy-1.8.x.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.7-SNAPSHOT-81.jar)
  InputFix ([输入修正]InputFix-1.8.x-v2.jar)
  ShoulderPlugin ([越肩视角]ShoulderSurfing-1.8.8_1.8.9-1.1.jar)
  FMLPlugin (【物品整理】InventoryTweaks-1.60-40.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

Time: 20-7-2 上午11:12
Description: Initializing game

net.minecraft.client.renderer.StitcherException: Unable to fit: dwa:items/twelfth_sonic_screwdriver, size: 512x512, atlas: 8192x8192, atlasMax: 8192x8192 - Maybe try a lower resolution resourcepack?

replies.txt_content: 删除FoamFixAPI（或替换为FoamFixAPI-Lawful），然后重试。
